Package model

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
model.UserManager
public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the User Manager. The User Manager has several attributes and methods storing any implementation of the DAOs.
Version:
22/5/2021
Author:
Riccardo Giacalone (ricardo.giacalone@students.salle.url.edu), Guillermo Gonzalez (guillermo.g@students.salle.url.edu), Oscar Cubeles (oscar.cubeles@students.salle.url.edu), Goddy Clinton (weriwohmbang.g@students.salle.url.edu)
